name: Cat Simulator HD
description:
The most beautiful and realistic Cat Simulator available on App Store! Play as a real cute cat inside a cool apartment and get ready for some real adventures. Knock off stuff, destroy whatever you like and cause the massive damage.

Run around, knock things over and make a mess with this cute little kitten. Every item you know over scores you points. See if you can get a high score!

- Stunning high quality 3D graphics
- Smooth and optimized performance
- Easy controls
- Multiple game modes
- Cool apartment to explore
- Cool warehouse to explore
- Ability to customize your cat (FOR FREE!)
- Hundreds of items to play with

Hope you enjoy!
